      public String getDetails()

      The formatted descriptor string

    • removeStage

      public void removeStage(int stageId)
      Removes a stage from the list of stages that belong to this race. Does not delete the stage, just removes it from the list.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The stage ID to remove from the list
